messages.message:
Do we have Swagger documentation for our APIs? This is a request from many of our customers. At the moment, RSA.

cc: @Aimé @piyush.mittal
we don't have swagger integration yet.
@Venkatesh Can you please raise a PFR and link it here. Also please add any customers you know need / want this to help with prioritization

I think there is one already
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/RELENG-41
I'll add some customers I know of
:smile: yeah, and the ticket has been open for more than a year... cc @shaunak @shiqi here
I know there was a request for this recently at BMO and I think @Jason and @Anshu worked on it, but am unsure where the status ended up for this.

@Anshu and I provided BMO with Swaggar for two specific api calls.  I was doing some looking, and there are a couple automated tools that seem to do the job but may require some code annotations.  I will get back to doing some more research.  There is a service now with SwaggarHUB that does OpenAPI spec publishing that could even be made available to our clients.  Need to check with @jean to see if we already have sufficient capability in our own API docs to just add a Swaggar/OpenAPI spec section/link if we can automate in our build process.

oh, i have a draft eng doc about incorporating openapi specs: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-z5DoAeMPiJ_gFOSFLJ7K6Ce8URHAUaGDlHndajmQmk/edit , but it is uh a draft T_T but this would cover the part of how the code will be annotated and how we'd extract openapi spec and generate docs :shrug:
@andy is actively working on this based on a proposal from the docs team earlier this year,so he can talk more about our progress.
i have a POC that i’ll merge into `master` this week
it wasn’t that fast :smiling_face_with_tear: there was a lot happening behind the scenes to get here :sweat_smile:

> i have a POC that i’ll merge into master this week
@andy is this go/pr/47342 ?
